title: Mustafizur Rahman
summary: Mustafizur Rahman (Bengali: মুস্তাফিজুর রহমান; born 6 September 1995), also known as The Fizz,[3][4][5][6] is a Bangladeshi international cricketer. He is specialized as a left-arm fast-medium bowler. He has taken the most wickets (13) in a debut One Day International (ODI) series. He is the first player to win the ‘Man of the Match’ award on both Test as well as ODI debuts.
